SEARCH

Package org.apache.lucene.analysis.opennlp

package org.apache.lucene.analysis.opennlp
Analysis components based on OpenNLP
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.opennlp.tools
    Tools to supply access to OpenNLP components.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OpenNLPChunkerFilter
    Run OpenNLP chunker.
    OpenNLPChunkerFilterFactory
    Factory for OpenNLPChunkerFilter.
    OpenNLPLemmatizerFilter
    Runs OpenNLP dictionary-based and/or MaxEnt lemmatizers.
    OpenNLPLemmatizerFilterFactory
    Factory for OpenNLPLemmatizerFilter.
    OpenNLPPOSFilter
    Run OpenNLP POS tagger.
    OpenNLPPOSFilterFactory
    Factory for OpenNLPPOSFilter.
    OpenNLPSentenceBreakIterator
    A BreakIterator that splits sentences using an OpenNLP sentence chunking model.
    OpenNLPTokenizer
    Run OpenNLP SentenceDetector and Tokenizer.
    OpenNLPTokenizerFactory
    Factory for OpenNLPTokenizer.
    SentenceAttributeExtractor
    Iterate through sentence tokens and cache their attributes.
